job.title: Implementation Engineer
job.description: pstrongImplementation EngineerstrongppUnited States  RemoteppbrppstrongOur Vision AI for GoodnbspstrongppWe would like to make the world a better place Computer VisionnbspThere are massive benefits to Chooch depending on the use case from preventing fraud to decreasing medical mistakes from increasing manufacturing quality to deepening our understanding of a changing worldppbrppWe believe Chooch solves a fundamental problem in Computer Vision the ability to acquire visual expertise in a structured way similar to human knowledge This will allow us to share our intuitive system with others in a way that will be truly beneficial to humanityppbrppThe business opportunity is also tremendous Chooch has partnered with leading global consultancies hardware manufacturers and systems integrators to make this happen and our company been covered by the leading analyst firms and press like the Washington Post and TechcrunchppbrppstrongUnleash Your PotentialstrongppA career with Chooch gives you all the opportunities and benefits that can only come from working for the trusted industry leader By joining our supportive group of globally diverse teammates you will solve reallife problems make a difference and have a global impact At Chooch we encourage you to be yourself grow with us and unleash your potentialppbrppstrongAbout the RolestrongppAs an important member of our implementation team you will work directly with our partners and customers to ensure the successful and timely implementation of our Computer Vision and edge computing solutions You will be responsible for ensuring our customers gain an indepth technical understanding of our solutions and how they integrate into their environment You will also provide ongoing technical training to our partners allowing them to perform implementations on their ownppbrppTo meet be successful you will need to keep up to date on our solutions as well as Computer Vision and AI technologies the industry and the competitive posture of the companynbspIn our team environment it is important to represent the company to our customers and our customers needs to Chooch in all implementation and technical aspects The implementation cycles are not long and will lead you working with several implementations concurrently While this is a highly dynamic and handson role it is also part of a collaborative team effortppbrppstrongEssential Duties and Responsibilities strongpulliProvide implementations for new and existing customers and partners coordinating closely with internal technical resources as neededliliDevelop and deliver customer technical solutions presentations and diagramsliliDevelop and provide technical training for our customers in support of implementations and ongoing customer satisfactionliliDevelop and provide ongoing technical training to our partners allowing them to perform implementations on their ownliliDevelop technical white papers and implementation guidesliliEvangelize and demonstrate our solutions during and after implementationliliAssist in providing technical support for RFPRFI bids technical evaluations and proposalsliliRespond to technical objections and create competitive differentiationliliDevelop and lead whiteboarding and technical sessions internally and with customers and partnersliliShare customer knowledge and feedback within ChoochliliStay up to date on technical trends and advances in computer vision and share internallyliliLook for opportunities to develop professional demoes and technical whitepapers and videos that increase customer understandingliliWork closely with our technical teams to improve product fit and integrationliliCommunicate the technical strengths of our products and potential improvements that can be made to increase customer satisfaction and Choochs competitivenessliulpbrppstrongAbout youstrongpulliHandson experience with Computer Vision andor embedded edge AI or AI implementation or development experience experience with cameras and camera technology a strong pluslili5 years experience working directly with customers and partners to deliver technical implementationsliliHandson experience with Containers such as Docker Docker Swarm or Kubernetes implementations and deploymentsliliBachelors degree in Computer Science or a related technical fieldliliExperience creating implementation and technical documentation and customer trainingliliExcellent customerfacing skills including a demonstrated trackrecord of interfacing with enterprise clients and partnersliliHighly effective presentation demonstration and communication skillsliliTrack record of communicating complex technical concepts to nontechnical customersliliAble to identify potential problems early and develop plans to avoid such problemsliliTrack record of learning new technologies quicklyliliKnowledge of implementation processesliliExcellent team player and builds trust internally and with customers and partnersliliAble to work independently and make decisions in real timeliliResponsive and able to prioritize workload based on customer and company needsliliStrong work ethic and a getthejobdone attitude in a fastpaced startuplike environmentliliKnowledge of Python is a plusliliGovernment clearance is a strong plusliliAble to travel up to 20liulpbrppChooch is an equal opportunity employer We do not make hiring employment or promotion decisions based on race religion color sex age national origin ancestry sexual orientation gender or identity or expression pregnancy or pregnancyrelated condition marital status height andor weightppnbspp
